'''''Toward Red-Hot Adventure!''''' is a [[World Quest]] in [[Natlan]].

==Steps==
# Talk to [[Katheryne]]

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You meet Katheryne once again in Natlan...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Katheryne:''' Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild, and to Natlan.
:{{DIcon}} So, about the commissions here...
:'''Katheryne:''' Please wait a moment. Once you've registered, you'll be able to accept commissions here.
:'''Katheryne:''' Natlan is a land full of challenge and opportunity, filled with powerful foes and unexplored ruins.
:'''Katheryne:''' Be bold and confident, and you'll be able to seize these opportunities and accomplish great things.
:'''Katheryne:''' Ad astra abyssosque, Adventurer! Forge onward, to reach the stars and conquer the abyss!
{{Dialogue End}}
